channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Murdoch Mysteries
channel.desc: Murdoch and Crabtree uncover a mysterious temple, which may be hiding ancient treasure.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Downton Abbey
channel.desc: Bates is taken aback when Vera threatens to expose old secrets which could bring down the Crawleys. Mary is the only one who can protect the family, but she pays a high price when she turns to Carlisle for help.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
channel.desc: On the menu this time are super sizzling seared scallops with black pudding and speedy mashed spuds with peas. There's also Jamie's egg and mango chutney flatbreads; rib-eye steak; and Jamie's almond pastry puff.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
channel.desc: Sesame seared tuna; messy meatball buns; chocolate rye Cookies; chicken pot pie with a crispy crust.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: CBC Toronto News
channel.desc: Dwight Drummond and the CBC Toronto News team take a comprehensive look at the day's top stories, with breaking news, live reports and updates relevant to the city of Toronto.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Evelyn gatecrashes Roy's evening; George lends Christina a shoulder to cry on.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Schitt's Creek
channel.desc: David joins some townies on a turkey hunt; Jocelyn and Moira have a spa day; Alexis meets Ted, the town veterinarian.
